description:
Buckle up and fly away with Bert and Ernie’s Great Adventures! This remarkable clay animated Sesame Street series has been specially adapted as e-books for your HP TouchPad, brought to you by ScrollMotion Kids.  Read along as Bert and Ernie imagine their way to faraway lands and find their way home again to 123 Sesame Street.  

***

  Ahoy! Best mateys Bert and Ernie arrr adventuring pirates, searching for Uncle Arrrnold’s buried treasure. Will they outwit a meddling monkey, decode a secret map, and uncover the buried treasure before the storm strikes? Come along and find out! 
  
Narrated by Gordon from Sesame Street.

   **Features**

  • Full Narration: Listen to Gordon from Sesame Street read the story aloud.
  • Page Flow: Move along each illustration in tandem with the story -- see a big story transformed for a small screen.  
• Visual Table of Contents: Jump easily to your favorite parts of the story, or resume reading where you left off. 
 
**About Us**

  • Sesame Workshop is the nonprofit educational organization that revolutionized children’s media with the landmark Sesame Street. Learn more at www.sesameworkshop.org.   

• ScrollMotion Kids helps families discover new ways to learn and play, combining your favorite childhood stories with the wonder of digital interactivity. To find out more, please visit www.scrollmotionkids.com
